summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5986 for the improvement of Grattan Street from Seward Park Avenue to the west line of Pritchard Island Bathing Beach as established by Ordinance No. 63864; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80138, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
